import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchUserWorksheets } from "./services/worksheetServices" export const TestModule3 = ({ user }) => { const [worksheets, setWorksheets] = useState([]) const handleWorksheetsFetchCall = () => { fetchUserWorksheets(user.id).then((data) => { setWorksheets(data) }) } useEffect(() => { handleWorksheetsFetchCall() }, [user.id]) return ( <>
